items.title: Warwick Ward
items.body: Thanks for checking out my portfolio, I'm an IT Consultant by day, whilst tinkering away on a wide range of web development projects, side projects, hussels and hobbies which are varied and many.

items.title: Home Assistant
items.body: I spend a good amount of time automating and integrating local devices and cloud services into my Home Assistant setup. I reguarly contribute back to the forums and have created a browser extension

items.title: Home Improvement
items.body: Making my way through a near full property renovation, discovering, learning, failing, designing and enjoying the process. Check out the Instagram feed for some major wins along the way

items.title: When is the next SpaceX launch
items.body: SpaceX, enough said... inspiring a planet to explore and reach for the stars. I wanted a fresh, simple, and clean launch list, so I coded whenisthenextspacexlaunch.com
